channel.title: How do i make places non wild and wild? please help!
channel.description: please tell me how, thanks guys!! appreciated!!

item.title: How do i make places non wild and wild? please help!
item.dc:creator: @1234ideclareathumbwa 1234ideclareathumbwar
item.description:
@1234ideclareathumbwa wrote:

Well since every tut that helps improve servers get deleted,I’ll tell you.

In your client.java find this

nonWild

or if you’re using Satan’s isle search for

public boolean inSafe

and a code like this should come out :

public boolean inSafezone() { // by Frost if((absX >=2708 && absX <=2816 && absY >=3149 && absY <=3235 ) || (absX >=3464 && absX <=3510 && absY >=9480 && absY <=9519 ) || (absX >=2438 && absX <=2447 && absY >=3082 && absY <=3098 ) || (absX >=3545 && absX <=3582 && absY >=3267 && absY <=3308 ) || (absX >=2812 && absX <=2867 && absY >=3230 && absY <=3310 ) || (absX >=2705 && absX <=2735 && absY >=9800 && absY <=9832 ) || (absX >=2528 && absX <=2548 && absY >=4710 && absY <=4725 ) || (absX >=2370 && absX <=2420 && absY >=5125 && absY <=6169 ) || (absX >=2794 && absX <=2814 && absY >=9190 && absY <=9220 ) || (absX >=3227 && absX <=3239 && absY >=9320 && absY <=9310 ) || (absX >=3021 && absX <=3057 && absY >=4816 && absY <=4850 ) || (absX >=2508 && absX <=2540 && absY >=4627 && absY <=4670 )) return true; else return false; }
Sorry mine is very long.
After any || add the same thing with the coords of your destination.
The coords of the place you want to be must be recorded down on a paper.
the first absX is the coord of the bottom left corner of the place you want it to be safe
the second is the top right.
same goes for the other two absY’s.

Yeah and i’m not helping you with any errors

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make places non wild and wild? please help!

item.title: How do i make places non wild and wild? please help!

you change the absY and absX of what your server considers the wilderness.
